channel.title: VirtualPk - 24/7 Online Time - VPS - Unique Features - Earn Staff
channel.description:
Hello Everyone and welcome to the new advertisment of the soon to be HUGE rsps of VirtualPk so here is a little introduction of it:
We have currently a owner, Co-Owner(ME) and one mod as we make it harder to get staff but if you show dedication and skill it is easy enough to get it so if you are an experienced staff member looking for staff come over.
Some features we have: -full working god wars -pking full working -staking full working -0 no clipping -dungeoneering -summoning -snow floors -customs -pking skill (a new unique skill no other servers i have seen have this) -EVERYTHING YOU CAN DREAM OF WE HAVE
Our forums is also VPS hosted and is named virtualpk.com it is a amazing forums using SMF works and has many many boards with all the information you need
SO if you want to come and play the new to be best server VPS hosted come on over to virtualpk.com
LINKS YOU NEED Web client: http://virtualpk.com/forums/index.php?action=download Download Client: http://virtualpk.com/forums/index.php?action=download Forums: virtualpk.com
